name: dgwyer
description: Block Editor plugin generated by create-block-plugin â€“ build step required.
author: blockhandbook

scripts.start: npm run browser-sync & npm run tailwind:watch
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run publish:increment-version && git add . && git tag $npm_package_version -m 'Plugin update.' && git push --tags
scripts.server:start: npx wp-env start && npm run cli:install-gutenberg && npm run cli:permalinks
scripts.svn:add: cd svn && svn add trunk/* && svn add assets/* && svn add branches && svn add tags/*
scripts.svn:tag: cd svn && svn cp trunk tags/$npm_package_version
scripts.zip: npm run zip:mkdir && bestzip $npm_package_config_slug-$npm_package_version.zip ./$npm_package_config_slug/* && npm run zip:rmdir
scripts.cli:install-gutenberg: npx wp-env run cli wp plugin install gutenberg && npx wp-env run cli wp plugin activate gutenberg
scripts.cli:permalinks: npx wp-env run cli wp rewrite structure /%postname%/ --hard
scripts.server:setup: npm run setup && npm run server:start
scripts.setup: composer install && npm run composer:generate-autoloader && npm install && npm run build
scripts.zip:mkdir: mkdir $npm_package_config_slug && cp -r build includes src vendor LICENSE readme.txt $npm_package_config_slug.php ./$npm_package_config_slug
